Course-name: First Course on Partial Differential Equations - II
Course-instructor:

content: This is intended to be a first course on the subject Partial Differential Equations, which generally requires 40 lecture hours (One semester course). So, we plan to make this course in two parts ?¢‚Ç¨‚Äú 20 hours each. We plan to offer the first part starting in January 2021 and second part may be in July 2021 or latest by 2022.
